body_html:
Thank you @carpodaster. 🌷 Back to you.

I realised there was a problem with the rake task, so I changed that too.
The most important error seems to be if a team has an incorrect or outdated project_name. So I changed the rake task to found and log those errors.

(Edit:)
Re:

it would be good if we could assign the project from a dropdown list in the orga's view of a teams#edit

I created an issue for this (and other cool stuff we can do) once the rake task is done.

body:
Thank you @carpodaster. 🌷 Back to you. 

I realised there was a problem with the rake task, so I changed that too. 
The most important error seems to be if a team has an incorrect or outdated `project_name`. So I changed the rake task to found and log those errors.  

(Edit:)
Re:
> it would be good if we could assign the project from a dropdown list in the orga's view of a teams#edit

I created an issue for this (and other cool stuff we can do) once the rake task is done.
